definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: Only one state -- Michigan -- saw statistically significant increases in poverty two years in a row.
sentences.chinese: 只有密歇根州連續兩年貧困率攀升具有統計學意義。

sentences.english: It is called Bronner's CHRISTmas Wonderland in Frankenmuth, Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 它就是密歇根州法蘭克幕斯城的布朗納聖誕樂園。

sentences.english: So far eight people have died from flooding in Michigan and Indiana.
sentences.chinese: 至今密歇根州和印第安納州已有八人因洪水喪生。

sentences.english: "Let me be clear, we are not letting our guard down in Michigan in any way whatsoever," Gettelfinger said.
sentences.chinese: 說明白點，我們無論如何都不會在密歇根州有所鬆懈。

sentences.english: The college grew into what is now Michigan State University in East Lansing.
sentences.chinese: 這所學校發展成爲如今位於東蘭辛的密歇根州大學。

sentences.english: Autumn in Michigan is a visual treat.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根州的秋天對人們來說是一種視覺享受。
福特汽車公司的總部在密歇根州迪爾伯恩市。

sentences.english: 15-year-old boy who works in Michigan during the summer
sentences.chinese: 一名夏季在密歇根州打工的15歲男孩說。

sentences.english: In Warren, Mich., Karen Alexander doesn't see a shift in the economy.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根州沃倫的卡倫亞歷山大並不認爲經濟出現轉機。

sentences.english: One bank in the state of Michigan offered paper money with a picture of a wildcat on it.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根州一家銀行印製的錢幣上有野貓的圖像。

sentences.english: The president also will make mid-term election campaign stops in Iowa and Michigan .
sentences.chinese: 總統還會爲中期競選活動在愛荷華州和密歇根州停留。

sentences.english: Want to know what books 30-year-old bisexual Latina women from Michigan are reading?
sentences.chinese: 想知道密歇根州30歲的雙性戀拉丁婦女在看什麼書？

sentences.english: Nexteer employs thousands of people in Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 耐仕特在密歇根州僱傭了數千人。

sentences.english: A Michigan woman is being charged with a misdemeanor offense and is facing up to 93 days in jail.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根州一名婦女被控犯有可判入獄93天的輕罪。

sentences.english: The Company is headquartered in Livonia, Michigan, USA.
sentences.chinese: 公司總部目前位於美國密歇根州的Livonia。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1
